name: Dynamic Mockups
author: Dynamic Mockups

sections.description:
Why Use This Plugin?

This plugin boosts your conversion rate by giving users a real-time preview of their designs on your products. It generates images based on your mockups, allowing customers to visualize their creations instantly before making a purchase, significantly enhancing their shopping experience and decision-making.

Features

  1. Works with both Simple and Variable products.
  2. Choose from the Mockup Library of thousands of professionally designed mockups.
  3. Easily place the render button in multiple locations on the Product Page through the plugin’s settings page.

How to Use the Plugin?

  1. Create and Connect the API key you created from your Dynamic Mockups account.
  2. Choose mockup templates from our Public Library within your Dynamic Mockups account.
  3. Locate the mockup and smart object UUIDs in the template URL.
  4. Link your WooCommerce product by copying the mockup and smart object UUIDs.
  5. The generator will automatically appear on your linked product page. Customers can upload their designs, render the image, and see the final result instantly.

Get Support

Join our Slack community to stay updated with new features and connect with our developers. Whether you need help troubleshooting, or guidance on how to maximize the plugin’s potential, our team is ready to assist you with any issues related to the WordPress plugin.
sections.installation:
Download the plugin

Activate the plugin

Go to Dynamic Mockups Website and generate FREE API KEY

Use API KEY in plugin settings and start generating mockups
sections.faq:
Can I use my PSD files?

Yes, you can use virtually any PSD file you have or you find on the internet.

Will my rendered Mockups be in High Quality?

Yes, we will always export your Mockups in Full Quality.

How long does it take to render the images?

Depends on the uploaded design size and a number of connectors attached to the product. You will get a rendered image in a seconds right after you upload the design.

Can I request a new feature?

Absolutely! We want to create the tools you need. Request a feature by sending your request to our support email or using the support page in the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Support for Simple and Variable products.
  • Get Account info in settings page.
  • Connect mockups and smart objects in product admin panel.

short_description: Dynamic Mockups helps you auto-generate product Mockups for your e-commerce store with our API and integrations.
